content: irresistibly squishy this crochet gingercat pillow​ is created in bernat blanket materials bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a orange leaf 10907 2 balls or 358 yds/327 m bernat® blanket™ 5 3 oz/150 g 108 yds/98 m contrast b vintage white 00006 1 ball or 50 yds/46 m contrast c cranberry 00705 1 ball or 29 yds/26 5 m measurements approx 18 wide x 22 tall 45 5 x 56 cm
